Cherrycake\Modules\Browser::getForEngine

getForEngine

Accepts an array in the form of [ENGINE_WEBKIT => "Whatever for webkit browsers (i.e: Chrome, Safari)", ENGINE_GECKO => "Whatever for gecko browsers (i.e: Firefox)", ENGINE_PRESTO => "Whatever for presto browsers (i.e: Opera)", ENGINE_OTHERS => "Whatever for other browsers"], and returns the array element's value that matches the currently detected client browser

    Signature

    public function getForEngine(array $data )

    Parameters

    $data — array
    A hash array with the browser-engine dependant data

    Returns

    The
    data from $data whose key corresponds to the currently detected browser's engine. Returns false if the detected current browser-engine key is not set in the data array, or if a ENGINE_OTHERS key has not specified.
